name: Naeniam Pre-Alpha 1.1
description:
Naeniam Pre-Alpha 1.1 Updates Patch Notes:

--------------------

--30/5/2019-- [Early Access] Pre-Alpha 1.1

--------------------

 || ChangeLog ||
  • Big Demon speed has been aumented (from 4.5 to 5).
  • Big Demon dmg has been aumented (from 40 to 60).
  • Big Ogre dmg has been aumented (from 40 to 50).
  • Wogol dmg has been aumented (from 10 to 20).
  • Imp dmg has been aumented (from 5 to 10).
  • Removed all enemies to change game evolution.
  • Only Undead enemies has been created on Stage 1 (The Graveyard). 
    • Skelet
    • Zombie
    • Ice Zombie
    • Tiny Zombie
    • Muddy
    • Big Zombie
  • Experience system has been changed.
    • Now each experience ball gives you 6 exp, but there is a minimal possibility to gives you 3 exp.
  • Added Keys to go to different Stages. (No more stages added btw).
    • Silver Key: you can go to Stage 2. (The Sewer).
    • Golden Key: you can go to Stage 3. (Hades).
  • Added "Coins". (No usel yet).
  • Added "Chests" (can contain Exp or Coins).
  • Camera ortographic size has been aumented (from 5 to 7).
  • Small changes to Stage 1.
  • More & new SFX.
  • New ability added to"Shaman Ork". (ShamanHeal)
    • ShamanHeal ability heal bosses or enemies.
    • ShamanHeal VFX & SFX  added.
  • Added the final boss of Stage 1 (Minotaur).
    • Minotaur HP = 300. (30 hearts).
    • Minotaur deals 50 hp with attack 1.
    • Minotaur deals 50 hp  with attack 2.
    • Minotaur deals 30 hp on collision.
    • Minotaur speed = 6.5f.
    • When dead, Minotaur drops a Silver Key & 40 exp balls (200 exp).
  • Added Artificial Intelligence to Minotaur.
    • Minotaur only attacks you if you are on his attack range (3.5f).
  • Added Elleon, the first NPC.
|| Fixed Bugs ||
  • There is no more visual bugs on Shaman Ork hearts.
  • HUD info texts have been fixed. (Now you can see the full number).
|| Bugs ||
  • You can't play Naeniam on "4/3" resolution.
  • When you are playing Naeniam in "21/9",  player level & player experience are not shown.
  • Enemies can ruin the game is some of them collision with you at the same time.
|| Game Info ||
  • There are 4 different types of enemies.
    • Undeads
      • Skelet (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Tiny Zombie (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Ice Zombie (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Zombie (40 hp, 10 dmg, poisonous)
      • Muddy (40 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Big Zombie (100 hp, 50 dmg)
    • Goblins
      • Goblin (20 hp, 5 dmg)
      • Ork Warrior (40 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Ork Shaman (60 hp, 10 dmg, heal)
      • Masked Ork (60 hp, 20 dmg)
      • Swampy (40 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Big Ogre (120 hp, 50 dmg)
    • Demons
      • Imp (20 hp, 10 dmg)
      • Wogol (40 hp, 20 dmg)
      • Chort (60 hp, 20 dmg)
      • Necromancer (40, hp, 10 dmg)
      • Big Demon (140 hp, 60 dmg)
    • Bosses
      • Minotaur (300 hp, 30-50-50 dmg)
      • Stage 2 boss (Not added yet)
      • Stage 3 boss (Not added yet)

If you find more bugs, pls let me know on comments.
